Package com.tloj.game.skills

package com.tloj.game.skills
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.tloj.game
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CharacterSkill
    Abstract class for character skill used during combat
    As with the
    invalid @link 
    BossAbility
    class, this class applies an adaptation of the Strategy pattern to the character skills, allowing for easy addition of new skills.
    This class is meant to be extended by specific character skills, guaranteeing modularity.
    CheatEngine
    Class that represents the Cheat Engine skill, which allows the character to force the max weapon roll.
    Daburu
    Class that represents the Daburu (double from japanese) skill, which forces next attack to inflict double damage.
    Focus
    Class that represents the Focus skill, which adds +3 damage on next attack.
    Guard
    Class that represents the Guard skill, which halfs the opponent next attack.
    Steal
    Class that represents the Steal skill, which allows the character to steal a random item and add it to the inventory with a 40% probability.
